page.title: 10Langford School Campus.
page.content: The main building is fifty years old, but the original school was built in 1840.It is a stone building situated on the edge of the village. The school is set on a large plot of land. To the front and sides of the building is a large tarmac playground which can be entered from the road by either a wooden gate or through a set of wrought iron gates.To the rear is a playing field with enough space for a large football pitch.Next to the school is a small adventure playground with a two storey wooden fort. Inside the school are two classrooms and a small assembly hall set off a long corridor.On the other side are toilets, cloakrooms and offices.Outside in the playing field is a single mobile classroom.
